text: Start low, go slow. AAN recommends therapeutic window for neuropathic pain of 1800-3600 mg/day. Average daily dose is only 856 mg/day, as most pts can't tolerate side effects, which are dose-specific. Needs to be taken in 3 divided doses, as half-life is very short.
